Text: Come on ! Nobody is going to download one compressed file without knowing what books (if any) it contains... What waste of time...
Is impossible for me to list the name of all books. I sorry, but I dont have time.

Thanks for the upload!

But on my system I can't handle one that big except piece by piece.

So, maybe 3-6 pieces?

But I'd stop everything else on my system for a big A A Fair (Earle Stanley Gardner) UL!

Thanks again.
Why even bother if you can't provide details on what is in this massive file?  You are doing a disservice with this.  I refuse to waste the bandwidth on this.
As many people are asking, I will change the arquive. I will stop send now. I will separate the books in pastes and describe the books here. After, I will start send again.

If you are not doing anything bad, like viruses or so, you should upload them individually in a big torrent, no rars, so we can choose which to download and which not, like everybody does, few would go for the 7 gigs to really read 10 or 15...
Don't compress them either rar or zip or anything. so people can choose the books they want even one or two or all.

I uploaded another torrent with those books. The torrent is "books 2". I didnt compress the books, they are organized in some pastes. You can look and chose the books.  i added more books in this torrent. I apologize for any problem.
i will upload a new torrente later. Now, it looks that pirate bay is with problem, because I am trying to upload but it does not work.
